Occupational Therapy Qual ifying Examination Reading List
• Babara A. Boyt Schell, Glen Gillen and Marjorie Scaffa (2014) Willard and Spackman’s Occupational
Therapy 12 th Edition. Philadelphia, Lippincott Williams and Wilkins.
• Brown, C. (2011) Occupational Therapy in Mental Health: a Vision for Participation.   Philadelphia, FA
Davis and Co.
• Christiansen, C.H., Baum, C.M. and Bass, J.D. (2015 ) Occupational Therapy: Performance,
Participation and Well Being. 4 th Edition. New Jersey, Slack Incorporated.
• Curtin, M., Molineux, M. and Supyk -Mellson, J. (2010) Occupational Therapy and Physical
Dysfunction: Enabling Occupation. 6 th Edition. London, Elsevier.
• Drake, R., Vogl, A.W., Mitchell, A.W.M. (2014) Grays Anatom y for students. 3 rd edition. Elsevier
• Katz, N. (eds) (2011) Cognition, Occupation and Participation Across the Life Span. Bethesda, AOTA
Press.
• Martini, F. H., Nath, J. L., & Bartholomew, E. F. (2018). Fundamentals of Anatomy and Physiology.
11th Global E dition. Pearson.
• Dancza, K & Rodger, S (2018) Implementing occupation -centred practice: A practical guide for
occupational therapy practice learning. London: Routledge.
• Pendleton, H, M. and  Schultz -Krohn, W. (eds.) (2017 ) Pedretti's Occupational Therapy :  Practice Sk ills
for Physical Dysfunction. 8 th Edition.  St. Louis, Elsevier
• Radomski, M.V. and Latham, C.A.T. (eds) (2014). Occupational Therapy for Physical Dysfunction. 7 th
Edition. Philadelphia : Wolters Kluwer Health.
• Turpin M, Iwama MK (2011) Using occupational therapy models in practice: A field guide . Edinburgh:
Churchill Livingstone Elsevier.
